comments.text:
Buzzfeed:
Just 'cause you *sometimes* make videos aimed towards equality for the 
genders, doesn't mean you actually have it down pat. Since when is it a 
thing for all girls to love talking about boys and shopping and all guys to 
love beer and hate get dragged to clothing stores by their girlfriends?
Stop enforcing these stupid, stereotypical gender roles into your videos.
